amendment.description: To clarify the duties and responsibilities of the Ombudsman of the National Intelligence Authority and of the Analytic Review Unit within the Office of the Ombudsman.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3748 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 3748 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S10218-10219; text: CR S10219) To clarify the duties and responsibilities of the Ombudsman of the National Intelligence Authority and of the Analytic Review Unit within the Office of the Ombudsman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3748 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3748 proposed by Senator Roberts.
